attributes.action: Government.: Ban the Film ''Innocence of Muslims'' everywhere!
attributes.additional_details:
Muslim faith is attacked, our Beloved Prophet SAW is insulted and degraded and the Film overall is misleading.
It has already provoked anger in many Muslims throughout the Middle East and before it causes any more damages, the Film should be banned ASAP!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the British Board of Film Classification (BBFC).
